feed.title: Undb Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Undb: v0.10.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Merge main into develop branch by @github-actions in https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/pull/1585
  • chore(deps): update dependency @swc/core to v1.3.91 by @renovate in https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/pull/1586
  • chore: upgrade dependencies by @nichenqin in https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/pull/1587
  • style: create base modal ui by @nichenqin in https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/pull/1588
  • chore(deps): update dependency lucide-svelte to ^0.282.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/pull/1589
  • fix: fix issue with dropdown menu not displaying when clicked by @WanShufen in https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/pull/1591
  • chore(deps): update dependency lucide-svelte to ^0.284.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/pull/1592
  • fix(deps): update dependency @asteasolutions/zod-to-openapi to v6 by @renovate in https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/pull/1590
  • fix: fix missing default base id for create table by @nichenqin in https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/pull/1594
  • Create base command handler test by @WanShufen in https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/pull/1595
  • test: test delete base command handler by @WanShufen in https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/pull/1593
  • chore(deps): update dependency @swc/core to v1.3.92 by @renovate in https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/pull/1596
  • docs: add swagger by @nichenqin in https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/pull/1597
  • chore: upgrade dependencies by @nichenqin in https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/pull/1598
  • feat(openapi): openapi get tables by @nichenqin in https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/pull/1600
  • fix: fix get record by id open api mapper by @nichenqin in https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/pull/1601
  • fix: fix openapi field mapper ignore controlled fields by @nichenqin in https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/pull/1602
  • feat: openapi get table by id by @nichenqin in https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/pull/1603
  • test: test import template command handler by @WanShufen in https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/pull/1599
  • fix: fix cannot create webhook by @nichenqin in https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/pull/1605
  • chore: style modification by @WanShufen in https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/pull/1604
  • feat: get webhook by id open api by @nichenqin in https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/pull/1606
  • chore(deps): update dependency electron to v27 by @renovate in https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/pull/1608
  • fix(deps): update dependency better-sqlite3 to v9 by @renovate in https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/pull/1610
  • fix(deps): update opentelemetry-js monorepo by @renovate in https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/pull/1609
  • chore(deps): update dependency lucide-svelte to ^0.285.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/pull/1611
  • chore(deps): update dependency lucide-svelte to ^0.286.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/pull/1612
  • chore(deps): update dependency @swc/core to v1.3.93 by @renovate in https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/pull/1613
  • chore(deps): update dependency lint-staged to v15 by @renovate in https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/pull/1615
  • chore(deps): update dependency svelte-gantt to v4.1.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/pull/1617
  • chore(deps): update dependency svelte-gantt to v4.2.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/pull/1618
  • chore(deps): update dependency lucide-svelte to ^0.288.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/pull/1620
  • chore(deps): update dependency @tanstack/svelte-query to v5 by @renovate in https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/pull/1619
  • chore(deps): update dependency bits-ui to ^0.6.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/pull/1621
  • chore(deps): update commitlint monorepo to v18 (major) by @renovate in https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/pull/1622
  • chore(deps): update dependency @swc/core to v1.3.94 by @renovate in https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/pull/1623
  • chore(deps): update actions/setup-node action to v4 by @renovate in https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/pull/1628
  • fix(deps): update dependency @nestjs/schedule to v4 by @renovate in https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/pull/1627
  • chore(deps): update dependency bits-ui to ^0.7.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/pull/1632
  • chore(deps): update dependency @swc/core to v1.3.95 by @renovate in https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/pull/1630
  • chore(deps): update dependency lucide-svelte to ^0.289.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/pull/1633
  • chore(deps): update dependency taze to ^0.12.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/pull/1635
  • chore(deps): update dependency bits-ui to ^0.8.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/pull/1634
  • chore(deps): update dependency trpc-svelte-query to v2 by @renovate in https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/pull/1637
  • chore(deps): update dependency lucide-svelte to ^0.290.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/pull/1638
  • feat: export ts by @nichenqin in https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/pull/1640
  • chore: upgrade dependencies by @nichenqin in https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/pull/1641
  • Release version v0.10.2 by @github-actions in https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/pull/1642

Full Changelog: https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/compare/v0.10.1...v0.10.2

entry.title: New release for Undb: v0.11.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Merge main into develop branch by @github-actions in https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/pull/1643
  • chore(deps): update dependency tailwind-merge to v2 by @renovate in https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/pull/1644

  • fix(deps): update dependency openapi-typescript to v7.0.0-next.5 by @renovate in https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/pull/1673

entry.title: New release for Undb: v1.0.0-1
entry.content:

  • Merge main into develop branch by @github-actions in https://github.com/undb-io/undb/pull/1643
